basics.name: Sven Athanase
basics.label: DevOps Engineer
basics.summary: Aspiring DevOps Engineer with a strong foundation in automation, cloud infrastructure, and CI/CD pipelines. Currently pursuing an apprenticeship to gain hands-on experience and contribute to the development of efficient and scalable systems.

work.name: MipihSIB
work.summary: Streamlining IT operations through automation with Rundeck, Python, and Ansible, and ensuring the reliability of infrastructure and systems.
highlights: Automated routine operational tasks using Rundeck, reducing manual interventions.
Developed Python scripts to enhance system management and monitoring.
Implemented Ansible playbooks to standardize infrastructure provisioning.
responsibilities: Automated operational workflows and incident resolution processes using Rundeck.
Developed and maintained Python scripts for infrastructure monitoring and reporting.
Configured and deployed Ansible playbooks to manage and provision systems.
Collaborated with IT teams to identify areas for automation and improve operational efficiency.
achievements: Reduced incident resolution times by implementing automated workflows with Rundeck.
Standardized infrastructure provisioning, leading to consistent and reliable deployments.

work.name: SIB
work.summary: Managed and maintained system and network infrastructures, ensured operational efficiency, and automated routine tasks using Python.
highlights: Optimized network performance by identifying and resolving bottlenecks.
Automated repetitive tasks to improve workflow efficiency using Python.
responsibilities: Monitored and maintained system and network infrastructure to ensure availability and performance.
Resolved complex technical issues related to system and network configurations.
Automated routine maintenance tasks and reporting using Python scripts.
Collaborated with IT teams to implement and document new network solutions.
achievements: Improved network reliability through proactive monitoring and quick resolution of incidents.
Developed Python scripts to reduce manual workload and increase team productivity.

work.name: SIB
work.summary: Prepared and installed infrastructure packages in establishments, ensured proper operation through interventions and ticketing, and supported users on-site.
highlights: Successfully deployed infrastructure solutions across multiple establishments.
Resolved technical issues efficiently to maintain system performance.
responsibilities: Prepared and installed the infrastructure pack in various establishments.
Ensured system reliability and functionality through on-site interventions and ticketing.
Collaborated with teams to address and resolve hardware and software issues.
achievements: Delivered high-quality technical support, contributing to improved operational efficiency.
Streamlined the deployment process, reducing setup times across sites.

volunteer.summary: Helped organize coding workshops and mentored new members.

courses: Introduction to System and Network Administration
Cloud Infrastructure with AWS and Azure
Infrastructure as Code with Terraform and Ansible

projects.name: Todo List Application
projects.description: A simple todo list application developed as part of coursework, showcasing skills in Golang and Bootstrap.
highlights: Developed the backend using Golang to handle CRUD operations.
Designed a responsive front-end interface with Bootstrap.
Implemented features such as task prioritization and completion tracking.

projects.name: Python Environment Deployment Script
projects.description: A Bash script to automate the setup of a simple Python development environment, allowing users to specify and install desired Python modules.
highlights: Automates the creation of a virtual environment for Python projects.
Installs user-specified Python modules from requirements.
Simplifies the initial setup process for Python developers.

projects.name: Application Management with CI/CD Pipeline
projects.description: A project to manage and deploy applications using Docker, Kubernetes, and Minikube, with a complete CI/CD pipeline setup.
highlights: Containerized applications using Docker for consistent environments.
Deployed applications on Kubernetes clusters managed with Minikube.
Implemented a CI/CD pipeline to automate build, test, and deployment stages.
